import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Routes, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import MCQ from './mcq'; import Home from './App'; import './App.css'; import Particle from "./particle"; // Added smooth scroll function for navigation links function handleSmoothScroll(event) { event.preventDefault(); const targetId = event.currentTarget.getAttribute("href").slice(1); const targetElement = document.getElementById(targetId); if (targetElement) { targetElement.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "start", }); } } function App() { const [selectedCourse, setSelectedCourse] = useState(""); // Added state for course selection const [showPopup, setShowPopup] = useState(false); // Added state for login popup visibility const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); // Added state for login/register toggle const handleDropdownChange = (event) => { setSelectedCourse(event.target.value); }; const togglePopup = () => setShowPopup(!showPopup); // Added toggle for popup return ( {/* Navbar */}
